destroyContract

devdoc.author: loic1
devdoc.details: Simple smart contract which allows to establich a platform that facilitates business in remote areas

params._businessId: identifier of the Business which accepts the Event

params._description: description of the Business to add (may include any necessary information)
description of the Community to add (may include any necessary information like website links)

addPlatformManager(address).details: addPlatformManager(): add an account to the list of platform managers

params._manager: address of the manager to add

params._compensationRate: compensation rate of the pledge asked by the owner to provide their Room to the Community
params._description: description of the Room to add (may include any necessary information)

concludeEvent(uint256).details: concludeEvent(): conclude an Event (may be called by anyone, in particular, it could be automated using Oraclize or Ethereum Alarm Clock))

params._businessOwnerRefund: amount in wei the business owner will be refunded with
params._participantRefunds: list of the amounts in wei each partiipant will be refunded with
params._roomOwnerRefund: amount in wei the room owner will be refunded with

currentTime().details: currentTime(): Function used for Javascript tests

destroyContract().details: destroyContract(): destroy the contract and send ether balance to the contract owner (development purposes)

dropEvent(uint256).details: dropEvent(): drop an Event (may be called by anyone, in particular, it could be automated using Oraclize or Ethereum Alarm Clock))

getEvents(uint256).details: getEvents(): get all the Events of a Community
getEvents(uint256).return: _events identifiers of all the Events in the Community

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

removePlatformManager(address).details: removePlatformManager(): remove an account from the list of platform managers

params._manager: address of the manager to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

submitComplaint(uint256,string).details: submitComplaint(): submit a complaint about an Event

params._description: description of the complaint (may include any necessery information)

params._businessId: identifier of the Business which submits the Event
params._businessOwnerPledge: amount of wei asked from the business owner
params._communityId: identifier of the Community to suggest the Event into
params._deadline: end date for the event to be accepted by a business owner in epoch seconds
params._description: description of the Event (may include any necessary information like webite links)
params._duration: duration of the event in epoch seconds
params._minNbOfParticipants: minimum number of participants threshold for the Event state to be able to switch to Accepted
params._participantPledge: amount of wei asked from the participants
params._roomId: identifier of the Room the Event is set to take place into (0 is no room)
params._startDate: start date of the event in epoch seconds
params._transportationCommissionRate: commission rate asked from the participants to secure the transportation cost reimbursement

params._businessOwnerPledge: amount of wei asked from the business owner
params._communityId: identifier of the Community to suggest the Event into
params._deadline: end date for the event to be accepted by a business owner in epoch seconds
params._description: description of the Event (may include any necessary information like website links)
params._duration: duration of the event in epoch seconds
params._participantPledge: amount of wei asked from the participants
params._roomId: identifier of the Room the Event is set to take place into (0 is no room)
params._startDate: start date of the event in epoch seconds
params._transportationCommissionRate: commission rate asked from the participants to secure the transportation cost reimbursement

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

withdrawalance().details: withdrawBalance(): withdraw the account's available balance

devdoc.title: Pledgeo

destroyContract().notice: selfdestruct is an in-build method in solidity selfdestruct will kill the contract and transfer the ether to specified address in ethereum blockchain it is not possible to remove anything but can be nullified

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

userdoc.notice: You should use this contract for development purposes only
